captions.text: "Oh"
“I wonder if Tchang bought this”
"Why did you have to say that?"
Let's start with a purely French reference...
No, Belgian!
What? Tintin's Belgian.
Wait Moulinsart Thomson and Thompson...
Come on, he's not stereotyped but he's French!
You know that bad feeling something's wrong...
Like seeing the packaging...
This feeling you're about to play some awful platformer
where you're gonna fall in voids
and die in improbable spots.
Tell you what, you're damn right!
This game is a cruel punishment inflicted upon yourself.
It's like the worst of platformers were grouped as one.
Like in the first level:
I have to get the "1up" on the loco
but I can't jump far enough.
I spent the next half hour trying
before getting this little thing here
is actually a spot you can jump on.
How on Earth can you guess that when it fades into the background?
Back to the hotel, I have to fetch a letter
while dogs, cooks and maids are trying to kill me.
Probably the worst hotel ever.
See? This is typical.
How am I supposed to avoid this cook?
I can't move to the foreground nor jump pass him!
All I can do is let him kill me. Moreover I...
I don't get hurt if I bent?
See, exactly what I'm talking about!
This game is a mix of frustrating baffling and impossible actions!
"Billions of blue blistering barnacles !"
So, I got rid of the killer cooks
and finally reached the desk,
to be told the Captain has the letter.
Couldn't you say so you drunk?
"May be the whiskey..."
"Tchang's dead how dreadful!"
Yeah well you don't seem too upset about it.
So let's go to Nepal, and this is when
you're getting something's wrong with this game.
I mean, a dog that hurts you, I can get that
But someone just tell me why Tintin gets killed by a bell?
How come a 10g bell can possibly kill a 25 year-old man?
So I find some kid who asks me to follow him.
He goes back. Good, it's closer.
"Come on Snowy, let's see where he's going!"
Come on where'd he go? Didn't he go left?
"To follow: go behind (someone walking)/ cont.: forego. For ex: "Little Chinese bastard asked me to follow him, following that jerk made me waste my time""
About the plot of the game no problem:
graphics matches Herge's comic universe
and the story tends to stick to the comic.
Even too much sometimes:
Remember in the movie when Haddock
hurtles down a slope and has to go left of a
statue not to be cursed.
"Left or right, what's the difference?"
"Left sahib! Keep to the left!"
"I'm trying!"
The scene occurs except the slope is 20kms long with 150 statues.
Was fucking worth climbing...
Oh shit a rock.
I control nothing!
I don't get it.
Ah fuck I went left.
Gooooosh they were really high when they encoded this game.
This game gets tougher and tougher
at each level it's just legendary.
It's just impossible.
And I'm playing on easy mode.
And if it wasn't enough the password is only every FIVE levels!
Why on Earth every five levels?
Why not at EVERY level?
Don't you think this game is impossible enough seriously?
Were the developers too lazy to add a password to each level?
Fuck...
Fuuuck!
FUUUCK!!!
Look at that, it's just impossible.
Was this game REALLY designed for
KIDS watching Tintin on TV?
How can a 10yo kid complete
this game if even I cannot??
Why do my stupid “friends” always leave me behind?
Why is there a void in a plane?
Why is this game so cruel?
Look, if you don't reach the exact middle
of the spot, you just go through it.
The further you go in the story the harder it gets.
Look, there I have to use the wind to jump farther
and when I get to the end...
Nothing. No way to continue.
The useless ax makes me just kill myself.
What a sad ending after climbing the Himalayas.
I guess I have to jump and shoot the pick in synch
But why is it so fucking hard?
It's just a game not a fighter pilot simulation!
"Please hang yourself for playing this crap."
I can't continue sorry. I spent so much time on it I even dream about it!
Enough with it.
"Big fat crappy game"
We'll meet again in Hell.
Don't miss our next awesome reviews!
The Gamer in the Attic

comments.author: owen90ify

comments.text:
Après cinq ans, je suis toujours étonné que cette vidéo se trouve encore 
sur YouTibe et que le JDG ne se soit pas pris un procès canon. Non parce 
que, Nick Rodwell, détenteur des droits de Tintin, est le plus gros morfale 
de merde de l'univers, dès qu'un truc estampillé Tintin, aussi ridicule 
soit-il, échappe à son contrôle, il envoie ses sbires pourrir la vie du 
malheureux qui a osé fauter à coups de poursuites judiciaires. Il a même 
menacé un GAMIN qui avait fait quelques copies de son élocution sur Tintin 
(pour des proches) dans laquelle y'avait des images "copyrightées" de 
Tintin... Sérieux, JDG a le cul bordé de nouilles. D'autres n'ont pas eu 
cette chance.﻿

choisis mais c'est compréhensible ça va. On peut aussi reprocher que des

phrase. Je sais pas si c'est toi qui traduit ou un tierce mais c'est bien 
fait ^^﻿
comments.author: Kaleh
